translation: Mahāyāna Sutra of Immeasurable Life
Thus I've heard.
One time, the Bhagavān was present at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: He was at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.
He was with a large group of monks and nuns.

source_sentence: 千二百五十人大菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translation: There were twelve hundred and fifty great bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and multitudes of people.
They were all sitting together.
It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the boy Mañjuśrī.
He told the boy Mañjuśrī.
"There's a world above Mañjuśrī.
It's called the cluster of immeasurable merit.
In that land there's a Buddha.
He's called the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Wisdom and Determination.

source_sentence: 阿耨多羅三藐三菩提現為眾生開示說法。
translation: He is the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Wisdom and Samantabhadra who reveals and teaches the Dharma for sentient beings.
Mañjuśrī listened intently.
"All the people of Southern Monastery have short lifetimes.
Their life span is limited to a hundred years.
Among them, there are many who die young and in vain.

source_sentence: 曼殊如是無量壽如來功德名稱法要。
translation: Mañjuśrī thus explains the essentials of the Tathāgata's merits and name.
If there are sentient beings who hear the name, then they can write it themselves.
If they write it themselves, or have it written by someone else, it can become a sūtra scroll.

source_sentence: 或使人書能為經卷受持讀誦於舍宅所住之處。
translation: They might cause someone to write it, make it into a scroll, memorize it, read it, and recite it where they live in their house.

source_sentence: 以種種花鬘瓔珞塗香末香而為供養。
translation: They make offerings with various flowers, jewelry, jewelry, perfume, and powdered incense.
If his life is ended, he'll again attain prolonged life.
He'll be able to fulfill a hundred years.
Thus, Mañjuśrī.
'Suppose there are sentient beings.

source_sentence: 得聞是無量壽智決定王如來一百八名號者。
translation: If they hear these 108 names of the Tathāgata King of Limitless Life and Wisdom Determination, their long life will be enhanced.
It will give them a long life.
Suppose there's a sentient being.
Their great life is about to end.
They'll remember the Tathāgata's name.
They'll then have their life expectancy increased.
Thus, Mañjuśrī.
"Suppose there are good men and good women.
They want to pursue a long life.

source_sentence: 於是無量壽如來一百八名號有得聞者。
translation: If they hear the one hundred and eight names of the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Life, they can write them themselves.
Either he writes them himself.

source_sentence: 若使人書受持讀誦得如是等果報福德具足。
translation: If he causes others to write them, memorize, read, and recite them, he'll attain such rewards and perfect virtue.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)鉢唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆唎莎訶(十五)世尊復告曼殊室利。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apolimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnī (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasṃsaka (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gāthagāna (11) svāhā somaṭikāti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānaya (14) pārijāta svāhāhā (15) The Bhagavān again told Mañjuśrī.

source_sentence: 如是如來一百八名號有自晝。
translation: "Thus, the Tathāgata's one hundred and eight names have a pārijāta.

source_sentence: 或使人書為經卷受持讀誦。
translation: He might cause someone to write them down as a sūtra scroll, memorize them, and recite them.
If their life span is up, they'll then reach a full 100 years of life.

source_sentence: 終此身後得往生無量福智世界無量壽淨土。
translation: After ending this life, he'll be reborn in the Pure Land of Immeasurable Merit and Immeasurable Life in the World of Immeasurable Wisdom.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)鉢唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)莎婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時有九十九姟佛等。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī(1) Apramitra(2) Aparamitra(2) Uyanna(3) Subhijña(4) Rāzo(5) Tathāgata(5) Tathāgata(6) Tammuzha(7) Savasanta(8) Parivarta(9) Dharmatī(10) Kakana(11) Sahajyuktatī(12) Sadvāvavideha(13) Mahānāya(14) Parivarta(15) At the time, there were 99 large buddhas and so forth.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: All at once, they spoke with one voice, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)鉢唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)莎婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆唎莎訶(十五)爾時復有一百四姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī(1) Apalimitra(2) Aparayanna(3) Subhijña(4) Rāzo(5) Tathāgata(5) Tathāgata(6) Tammuzha(7) Sarvâstivāda(8) Parivarta(9) Dharmadeva(10) Gacana(11) Sahāsaprati(12) Sarvâstivāda(13) Mahānāya(14) Parivarta(15) At that time, there were another one hundred and four linen buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They all spoke at once with one voice, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Limitless Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆灑莎訶(十五)爾時復有七姟佛。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī(i) apalimitra(ii) ayurveda(iii) svāhina(iii) svāhina(iv) rajaya(v) tathāgata(vi) tamānita(vii) svāsasṃghārā(viii) pārijātī(ix) dharmadhātu(x) gagāna(xi) svāhacandī(xii) svāhina(xiii) mahānaya(xiv) pārijāsa(xv) At that time, there were another seven linen buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經陀羅尼曰。
translation: They all spoke at once in unison, saying this dhāraṇī of the Essentials of the Sutra of Limitless Life.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有六十五姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī (1) Apramitra (2) Aparamitra (2) Uyanna (3) Subhīnti (4) Rāzo (5) Trāyastriṃśa (6) Taimeta Om (7) Savasanta Sikara (8) Parīśvara (9) Dharmatī (10) Kakana (11) Sahajyavṛddhi (12) Savasavṛddhi (13) Mahānāya (14) Parīśvara Saha (15) At that time, there were 65 other numerous buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They all spoke at once with one voice, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Limitless Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)莎婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有五十五姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī (1) Apramitra (2) Aparamitra (2) Uyanna (3) Subhijña (4) Rāzo (5) Trāyastriṃśa (6) Tāmaṇerī (7) Savasanta (8) Parīśvara (9) Dharmadeva (10) Kakana (11) Sahajyavṛttin (12) Sadvāvavideha (13) Mahānāya (14) Parīśvara Saha (15) At that time, there were another fifty-five linen buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They all spoke at once with one voice, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Limitless Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有四十五姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī (1) Apramitra (2) Aparamitra (2) Uyanna (3) Subhijña (4) Rāzo (5) Trāyastriṃśa (6) Taimeta Om (7) Savasanta Sikara (8) Parīśvara (9) Dharmatī (10) Kakana (11) Sahajyavṛddhi (12) Savasanta Vaiśuddhi (13) Mahānāya (14) Parīśvara Saha (15) At that time, there were 45 other large buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They all spoke at once in unison, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有三十六姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī (1) Apramitra (2) Aparamitra (2) Uyanna (3) Subhijña (4) Rāzo (5) Trāyastriṃśa (6) Taimeta Om (7) Savasanta Sikara (8) Parivarta (9) Dharmatī (10) Kakana (11) Sahassākkati (12) Savasavaiśuddhi (13) Mahānāya (14) Parivarta Sahassākkai (15) At that time, there were another 36 lunar buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They all spoke at once with one voice, saying this is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Limitless Life.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有二十五姟佛。
translation: "Skt. Bhagavatī (1) Apramitra (2) Aparamitra (2) Uyanna (3) Subhijña (4) Rāzo (5) Trāyastriṃśa (6) Taimeta Om (7) Savasanta Sikara (8) Parīśvara (9) Dharmatī (10) Kakana (11) Sahajyavṛddhi (12) Savasanta Vaiśuddhi (13) Mahānāya (14) Parīśvara Saha (15) At that time, there were another twenty-five lunar buddhas.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They spoke this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Limitless Life with one voice.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)爾時復有恒河沙姟佛。
translation: "Nanmo Bhagavatī (a) Apalimitra (b) Āyurveda (c) Subhīti (d) Rāzo (e) Trāyastriṃśa (f) Tāmaṇeta Om (g) Savasanta Sikara (h) Poliśuddhi (ix) Dharmadeva (x) Gacana (k) Sahassākkadi (l) Savasavaiśuddhi (xiii) Mahānāya (xiv) Poliśuddhasahā (xv) At that time, there was another one of those buddhas of the Ganges River.

source_sentence: 一時同聲說是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They spoke this essential sutra of the Sutra of Limitless Life with one voice.
The dhāraṇī said.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)善男子。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnī (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasan sikara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagana (11) svāhātukātu (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhātu (15) good sons.
"If there's someone who writes on their own.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: They teach others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.

source_sentence: 如其命盡復得長壽而滿年。
translation: If his life ends, he'll again attain a long life and a full life.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apolimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasanskara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhā somaṭikāti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānaya (14) pārijāsaprabhāsa (15) If there's a self-writer, teach others to write this sūtra of immeasurable life.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
After memorizing it and reciting it, he'll finish.
He won't fall into hell.
He'll attain knowledge of past lives while still in birth.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apāramitā (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnī (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamānītha oṃ (7) svāsasṃghārā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhā somaṭikāti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) if he writes it himself.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量宗要經。
translation: Teaching others to write is the essential sūtra of the Immeasurable School.

source_sentence: 受持讀誦如同書寫八萬四千一切經典。
translation: To memorize, recite, and read it is like writing 84,000 of all the sutras.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (a) apalimitra (b) ayurveda (c) sumbhīnti (d) rāzo (e) tathāgata (f) tamīnta o (g) svāsasan sikara (h) pārijātī (ix) dharmadhātu (x) gagana (k) svāhā soma kṛty (l) svāvabhī (xiii) mahānāya (xiv) pārijātī svāhā (xv) if one writes it oneself.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: Teaching someone to write is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
That's writing 84,000 of them.
He'll build a stūpa.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) Apolimitra (2) Aparayanna (3) Subhijña (4) Rāzo (5) Tathāgata (6) Tanneeta Om (7) Savasanta Sikara (8) Poliśuddhi (9) Dharmadhātu (10) Gacana (11) Sahassākkadi (12) Savasavaiśuddhi (13) Mahānāya (14) Poliśuddhātu (15) If one writes it themselves, teach others to write it.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: Teaching others to write is the essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.

source_sentence: 能消五無間等一切重罪。
translation: It can eliminate all serious sins such as the five kinds of unremitting sins.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)莎婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnī (4) rajaya (5) tantakāṭhya (6) tanyinta oṃ (7) sabhasan sikara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagana (11) sahā somachikāti (12) sabhāvavidhyā (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī sahā if he writes it himself.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
He memorizes it, recites it, and reads it.
Suppose someone is guilty.
He's like Sumeru who completely extinguishes it.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘彌悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)但他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīṃsumita (4) rajaya (5) dantakātya (6) tamānita oṃ (7) svāsasṃsikara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhātukāty (12) svāvavaiśuddhi (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) if one writes it down.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
He memorizes it, recites it, and reads it.
Suppose Māra, Māra's retinue.
Yakṣas and Rājasas.
They won't get an advantage over them.
They'll never have any hope of escape from death.'
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasanskara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhātukāṭī (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) if one writes it oneself.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
He memorizes it, recites it, and reads it.
When his life ends.
There will be ninety whole-life buddhas.
That person appears before him or her.
He'll be given the hand by the Buddha.
He'll be able to travel to all the buddha-blocs.
Don't give rise to doubts or confusions about this sūtra.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tametā o (7) svāsasan sikara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagana (11) svāhātukātu (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānaya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) if he writes it himself.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
He memorizes it, recites it, and reads it.

source_sentence: 常得四天大王隨其衛護。
translation: It's always guarded by the four celestial great kings.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasanskara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhātukāṭī (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) if one writes it down.

source_sentence: 教人書寫是無量壽宗要經。
translation: He teaches others to write this essential sūtra of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life.
He memorizes it, recites it, and reads it.

source_sentence: 當得往生西方極樂世界阿彌陀淨土。
translation: They will then be reborn in the Pure Land of Amitâbha in the Western Pure Land of Bliss.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶若有方所自書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apolimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rāzo (5) tantakāṭya (6) tanyinta oṃ (7) svāsasan sikāra (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhā somachikāti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā if there's a place where he writes it himself.

source_sentence: 使人書寫是無量壽經典之處。
translation: It's a place where people write these sutras of immeasurable life.

source_sentence: 則為是塔皆應恭敬作禮。
translation: Then, this is a stūpa that everyone should respect and venerate.
Suppose it's an animal.
A bird or animal could hear this sūtra.
Such are these kinds of creatures.

source_sentence: 皆當不久得成一切種智。
translation: They will all soon attain the knowledge of all kinds.'
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶若有於是無量壽經自書寫若使人書寫。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apolimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasan sikara (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagana (11) svāhā somachikāti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānaya (14) pārijātī svāhātu If someone writes this sutra of immeasurable life by themselves or by sending someone else to write it, they won't be subject to the body of a woman after all.
After all, they won't accept a woman's body.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆唎莎訶若有能於是經少分能惠施者等。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnī (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamānita oṃ (7) svāsasṃghārā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) kāgana (11) sahā soma kārtti (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānaya (14) pārijātī sahā If there's someone who can give a little bit of this sūtra, then he'll be able to give it to them.

source_sentence: 於三千大千世界滿中七寶布施。
translation: They will give alms to seven treasures in the fullness of 3,000 great one-thousand worlds.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)莎婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶若有能供養是經者。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) svāviniṃścittā (4) rāzo (5) tathāgata (6) tamāneta oṃ (7) svāsasṃghārā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhā somaṃghāṭī (12) svāvibhāṭī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā if there's someone who can make offerings to this sūtra.

source_sentence: 則是供養一切諸經等無有異。
translation: Then they're making offerings to all the sūtras and so forth, with no difference.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)如是毘婆尸佛。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rāzo (5) tantakāta (6) tanyinta oṃ (7) svāsasṃghārā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) sahāsaprāpti (12) svāsaprāpti (13) mahānāya (14) pārijāta sahā (15) thus is Vipaśyin Buddha.
Śikhin Buddha.
Viśvabhū, Kulūsundra, and Kauṇḍinya.
Kunāyamuni Buddha ...
Kāśyapa Buddha ...
Śākyamuni Buddha.
"Suppose someone makes offerings of seven treasures.
Thus, these seven buddhas.
Their merit is limited.

source_sentence: 書寫受持是無量壽經典。
translation: Writing, accepting, and upholding these sutras of immeasurable life.
Their merit is limitless.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)但他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)若有七寶等。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apalimitra (2) ayurveda (3) sumbhīnti (4) rāzo (5) dantakātya (6) tamānita oṃ (7) svāsasṃghārā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagāna (11) svāhātukāty (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijātī svāhā (15) If there are seven treasures and so forth.
Sumeru used them to make a gift.

source_sentence: 其福上能知其限量是無量壽經典。
translation: Its merit is so great that its limit can be known. It's a scripture of immeasurable life.
Their merit can't be known.
The dhāraṇīs say.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶(十五)如四大海水可知滴數。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (1) apolimitra (2) ayurveda (3) svāhina (4) rajaya (5) tathāgata (6) tamego (7) svāsasan svakarā (8) pārijātī (9) dharmadhātu (10) gagana (11) svāhātukātu (12) svāvavaijātī (13) mahānāya (14) pārijāsaprāpta (15) like the four great waters of the ocean whose number of drops can be known.

source_sentence: 是無量壽經典所生果報。
translation: These are the rewards produced by the scriptures of immeasurable life.
They can't be counted.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶若有自書。
translation: "Namo bhagavatī (a) apalimitra (b) ayurveda (c) svāhina (d) szoeya (e) tathāgata (f) tamegoṭṭa (g) svāsasṃshi kara (h) pārijātī (ix) dharmadhātu (x) kāgana (k) svāhā soma kṛty (l) svāvaṃshi (xiii) mahānāya (xiv) pārijātī svāhā if there's a writing of one's own.
He causes someone to write it down.
"This is a scripture of immeasurable life.
He also protects it and makes offerings to it.
That's like making an offering of reverence.

source_sentence: 一切十方佛土如來無有別異。
translation: There's no difference between the Tathāgatas of the ten directions and the Tathāgatas of the land.
The dhāraṇī says.

source_sentence: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶　布施力能成正覺　　悟布施力人師子　布施力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　持戒力能成正覺　　悟持戒力人師子　持戒力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　忍辱力能成正覺　　悟忍辱力人師子　忍辱力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　精進力能成正覺　　悟精進力人師子　精進力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　禪定力能成正覺　　悟禪定力人師子　禪定力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　智慧力能成正覺　　悟智慧力人師子　智慧力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入爾時如來。
translation: 南謨薄伽勃底(一)阿波唎蜜哆(二)阿喻紇硯娜(三)須毘儞悉指陀(四)囉佐耶(五)怛他羯他耶(六)怛姪他唵(七)薩婆桑悉迦囉(八)波唎輸底(九)達磨底(十)伽迦娜(十一)莎訶某持迦底(十二)薩婆婆毘輸底(十三)摩訶娜耶(十四)波唎婆囇莎訶　布施力能成正覺　　悟布施力人師子　布施力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　持戒力能成正覺　　悟持戒力人師子　持戒力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　忍辱力能成正覺　　悟忍辱力人師子　忍辱力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　精進力能成正覺　　悟精進力人師子　精進力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　禪定力能成正覺　　悟禪定力人師子　禪定力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入　智慧力能成正覺　　悟智慧力人師子　智慧力能聲普聞　　慈悲階漸最能入爾時如來。
After speaking this sūtra.

source_sentence: 一切世間天人阿修羅揵闥婆等。
translation: "All the gods, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and so forth of the world heard what the Buddha taught.
They all rejoiced greatly when they heard what the Buddha taught.
They were all greatly delighted.
They believed, accepted, and approved of it.
Foshuo wuliangshou zong yao jing
Tian Guangtan
